text: Andrey Kuznetsov was the defending champion but chose not to defend his title. Kenny de Schepper won the title after defeating Marco Cecchinato 2–6, 7–6(7–0), 7–5 in the final. ==Seeds== ==Draw== ===Finals=== ===Top half=== ===Bottom half=== ==References== * Main Draw * Qualifying Draw Citta di Como Challenger - Singles Category:Città di Como Challenger
title: 2016 Città di Como Challenger – Singles
